class.name: System.Diagnostics.Trace
class.summary: Provides a set of methods to help debug code.

property.name: AutoFlush
property.summary: Gets or sets value indicating whether Flush should be called on the listeners after each write.

property.name: IndentSize
property.summary: The number of spaces in an indent.

method.name: Assert(System.Boolean)
method.summary: Checks for a condition, and prints a stack trace if the condition is false.

method.name: Assert(System.Boolean, System.String)
method.summary: Checks for a condition, and displays a message if the condition is false.

method.name: Assert(System.Boolean, System.String, System.String)
method.summary: Checks for a condtion, and displays a message and a detailed message string if the condition is false.

method.name: Close
method.summary: Closes the Debug buffer.

method.name: Fail(System.String)
method.summary: Emits the specified error message.

method.name: Fail(System.String, System.String)
method.summary: Emits the specified error message and detailed error message.

method.name: Flush
method.summary: Flushes the listeners.

method.name: Indent
method.summary: Increments the indent level.

method.name: Unindent
method.summary: Decrements the indent level.

method.name: Write(System.Object)
method.summary: Writes the value of the specified object's ToString method to the listeners.

method.name: Write(System.String)
method.summary: Writes the specified message to each listener in the Listeners collection.

method.name: Write(System.Object, System.String)
method.summary: Writes the category name and value of the specified object's ToString method to each listener in the Listeners collection.

method.name: Write(System.String, System.String)
method.summary: Writes the category name and the specified message to each listener in the Listeners collection.

method.name: WriteIf(System.Boolean, System.Object)
method.summary: Writes the value of the specified object's ToString method to each of the listeners if the condition is true.

method.name: WriteIf(System.Boolean, System.String)
method.summary: Writes the specified message to each of the listeners if the specified condition is true.

method.name: WriteIf(System.Boolean, System.Object, System.String)
method.summary: Writes the value of the specified object's ToString message and category to each of the listeners if the condition is true.

method.name: WriteIf(System.Boolean, System.String, System.String)
method.summary: Writes the category and specified message to each listener if the specified condition is true.

method.name: WriteLine(System.Object)
method.summary: Writes the value of the object's ToString method, followed by a line terminator, to each listener.

method.name: WriteLine(System.String)
method.summary: Writes the specified message, followed by a line terminator, to each listener.

method.name: WriteLine(System.Object, System.String)
method.summary: Writes the value of the specified object's ToString method, along with a category, followed by a line terminator, to each listener.

method.name: WriteLine(System.String, System.String)
method.summary: Writes the specified category and message, followed by a line terminator, to each listener.

method.name: WriteLineIf(System.Boolean, System.Object)
method.summary: Writes the value of the object's ToString method to each listener if the specified condition is true.

method.name: WriteLineIf(System.Boolean, System.String)
method.summary: Writes the specified message to each listener if the specified condition is true.

method.name: WriteLineIf(System.Boolean, System.Object, System.String)
method.summary: Writes the value of the object's ToString method, and a category to each listener if the specified condition is true.

method.name: WriteLineIf(System.Boolean, System.String, System.String)
method.summary: Writes the specified category and message to each listener, followed by a line terminator, if the specified condition is true.
